creator: paulg@edp.fastfreenet.com

text:
You have the older servlet API classes available to your webapp, which have a 
slight incompatibility with the new ones, causing the compilation failure.
creator: remm@apache.org
crimmer@exln.com

text:
I have no idea how it happened, but you have the old servlet API JAR there. The
installable package does include the right version of the servlet API.
creator: remm@apache.org
